comment: I see a lot of potential in Karen as a student.
She loves to participate when she knows the answer.
When I ask questions, she is always happy to get the right answer.
She has demonstrated that she is able to learn new vocabulary quickly when she studies hard.
She seems to be gradually picking up a natural speaking grammar from paying attention to English-speaking in class.
Learning new vocabulary through reading is a skill that she is improving at.
I always enjoy to read  her writing in her English diary.
I'm always happy seeing Karen grow as a student in my class, and I hope she continues to study hard.
